personalInfo.name: Surender Gyanmote
personalInfo.title: Security Program Manager | Cloud Solutions, Database, Gen AI Architect
personalInfo.summary: 2+ decades of Oracle Database design, development, database, System Administration, Performance and Capacity, Database Architecture, Cloud Solutions Architecture, Oracle Engineered Systems Administration, Security advisor and Lead Program manager for application and tools security in Managed Cloud to support Risk Compliance and security teams, combined with 5+ years of Database architecture, design, development, and administration. Expert in hybrid database solutions integrating oracle RDBMS database for multiple customers. And, technical project lead for migrations of 200+ customer environments to new generation platform in @oracle services.

experience.title: Oracle DBA, System, Database & Cloud Solutions Architect
experience.description: Led planning, migrations, cutovers, and go-lives of cloud managed customers into Engineered Systems. Provided OCI Tenancy Administration, Database/System administration, on-prem & OCI migrations, and supported Tier1 customers as SME during escalations/outages.
achievements: Led enablement of OCI AI Infrastructure services and Disaster Recovery (FSDR) implementations
Supported 150+ customers as Performance Engineer on Oracle Databases and E-Business Suite
Drove sizing and capacity initiatives to migrate from legacy Dell to Intel-X servers
Supported 100+ Oracle Partners in Performance Labs on sizing, capacity, tuning, and best practices
ExaCare team member supporting Tier1 customers as SME for escalations and outages
Technical lead for migrations of 200+ customer environments from legacy to latest platform
Published white papers for Oracle Partners as deployment and best practices guides
Managed 200+ environments by Linux/Solaris system administration across LVM configuration, RAID management, NFS services, and security hardening

projects.title: Generative AI and AI Agentic Solutions Architect
projects.description: Architected and built multiple AI agentic POCs and solutions using multi-LLM models with GitHub integrations

projects.title: Managed Cloud Services @Customer Infra
projects.description: Oracle Cloud Migrations from Engineered Systems involving multiple global customers planning, migration, cutovers, and go-lives successfully onto Oracle Cloud DBAAS, EXACS, Object Storage, and Block Storage

projects.title: Application/Tools Security Program Manager
projects.description: Led application and tools development teams in designing and delivering secure internal and external solutions following Secure SDLC practices, OWASP top ten as a standard, and SANS top 25 for best coding standards

projects.title: Oracle Linux, Solaris, and Database, and OCI Database Cloud Services
projects.description: Designed hybrid solutions for multiple enterprise clients combining Oracle Linux, Solaris, and Oracle databases for transactional workloads

certifications: OCI - Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Architect Professional 2019, 2020, 2021 and 2024
Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2024 AI Foundations Associate (1Z0-1122-24)
OCI - Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2019 Architect Associate (1Z0-1072-19), 2020 and 2021
OCI - Oracle Autonomous Database Cloud 2019 Specialist (1Z0-931)
Multiple years of certifications on HIPAA, GDPR, Secured application development, secured coding, and customer data privacy
awards: Excellence Award of IT team – HCL Hewlett Packard
